sentences.en: A piece of glass punctured the back tyre.
sentences.cn: 一块玻璃把后轮胎戳破了。

sentences.en: Dash it! I've got a puncture in my bicycle tyre.
sentences.cn: 糟糕! 我的自行车轮胎扎破了.

sentences.en: He demonstrated how to mend a puncture.
sentences.cn: 他示范如何修补车胎刺孔.

sentences.en: I got a puncture on the way and arrived late.
sentences.cn: 我在路上扎破了轮胎,所以迟到了.

sentences.en: I had a puncture on the way and arrived late.

sentences.en: I have to see to a puncture in my bicycle tyre.

sentences.en: I'm sorry I'm late: My car had a puncture.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉我来迟了,我的汽车车胎被扎破了.

sentences.en: My bicycle had a puncture and needed patching up.
sentences.cn: 我的自行车胎扎了个洞,需要修补.

sentences.en: Obviously the puncture threw me a little, but I'm reasonably happy.
sentences.cn: 显然，轮胎扎破让我感到有些意外，不过我还是挺开心的。

sentences.en: She was cycling home when she had a puncture .
sentences.cn: 她骑车回家途中轮胎被扎破了。

sentences.en: Some cyclists carry repair outfits because they may have a puncture.
sentences.cn: 有些骑自行车的人带修理工具,因为他们车胎可能小孔.

sentences.en: Somebody helped me mend the puncture.
sentences.cn: 有个人帮我修补扎破的轮胎。

sentences.en: Somebody helped me to mend the puncture.
sentences.cn: 有人帮我补了车胎上的洞。

sentences.en: The front tyre has got a puncture.
The tyre is guaranteed never to puncture or go flat.
sentences.cn: 这种轮胎保证永远不会被扎破或撒气。

sentences.en: This was sod's law: when the spare tyre is in use, you will have a puncture.
sentences.cn: 这真是墨菲法则：一用备用轮胎，保准扎孔。

sentences.en: We had a slight mishap with the car, eg a puncture.
sentences.cn: 我们的汽车出了点小事儿(如轮胎扎破).

sentences.en: You puncture me when I become a great Italian thinker.
sentences.cn: 等我当了意大利伟人的思想家,你再来拆穿我吧.
